name: Keeper of the Flame (Game Jam)
description:
The Keeper has been commanded to carry the sacred flame, and light each brazier they find. Guide them deeper and deeper into the temple, avoiding traps and keeping the flame alive!

Controls are taught in-game, and can be accessed by holding the escape key. There are ten levels in total, good luck bearing the sacred flame, Keeper!

This game was created in one weekend for Ludum Dare #46 Game Jam. The theme for the jam was "Keep it Alive". The idea to make the game a platformer where you keep a torch burning came to me early, and everything really fell into place. The game was written in Game Maker Studio 2, and the art, music, and design were all done by me alone.
